You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

globalEvents.name: Mission Briefing
globalEvents.eventText:
You arrive to find your compatriots locked in battle with stormtroopers.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.
{-} Deploy the Rebel Troopers to the red highlighted spaces.

eventActions.theText: The rebel troopers have erected improvised barricades.

entityProperties.name: Barricade 1
entityProperties.theText:
The rebel troopers have barricaded themselves behind improvised cover.

{-} Rebel mission tokens represent barricades. Barricades are impassable terrain and can be attacked (Health: 8; Defense: 1 {G}). Rebel figures can move through a barricade as normal terrain.
{-} While defending, a Rebel Trooper can choose a barricade through which line of sight was traced to add 1 black die to his defense pool. Then, that barricade suffers {H} equal to the {G} results on that black die.

entityProperties.name: Barricade 2
entityProperties.theText:
The rebel troopers have barricaded themselves behind improvised cover.

{-} Rebel mission tokens represent barricades. Barricades are impassable terrain and can be attacked (Health: 8; Defense: 1 {G}). Rebel figures can move through a barricade as normal terrain.
{-} While defending, a Rebel Trooper can choose a barricade through which line of sight was traced to add 1 black die to his defense pool. Then, that barricade suffers {H} equal to the {G} results on that black die.

eventActions.theText:
{-} Rebel mission tokens represent barricades. Barricades are impassable terrain and can be attacked (Health: 8; Defense: 1 {G}). Rebel figures can move through a barricade as normal terrain.
{-} While defending, a Rebel Trooper can choose a barricade through which line of sight was traced to add 1 black die to his defense pool. Then, that barricade suffers {H} equal to the {G} results on that black die.

It's clear you won't have much time to finish their mission before they're overrun.

{-} Heroes have limited Reinforcements. At the end of each Round, for each defeated Rebel Trooper, 1 Reinforcement is spent to deploy another Rebel Trooper.
{-} When a hero withdraws, he is incapacitated instead, When activating, he receives only 1 action and can only use that action to perform a move.
{-} The door is locked to Imperial figures.
{-} The mission will progress when the door opens.
{-} The Rebels lose at the end of Round 6, or when there are no Rebel Troopers on the map and no Reinforcements left.

{-} Rebel mission tokens represent barricades. Barricades are impassable terrain and can be attacked (Health: 8; Defense: 1 {G}). Rebel figures can move through a barricade as normal terrain.
{-} While defending, a Rebel Trooper can choose a barricade through which line of sight was traced to add 1 black die to his defense pool. Then, that barricade suffers {H} equal to the {G} results on that black die.
{-} Heroes have limited Reinforcements. At the end of each Round, for each defeated Rebel Trooper, 1 Reinforcement is spent to deploy another Rebel Trooper.
{-} When a hero withdraws, he is incapacitated instead, When activating, he receives only 1 action and can only use that action to perform a move.
{-} The door is locked to Imperial figures.
{-} The mission will progress when the door opens.
{-} The Rebels lose at the end of Round 6, or when there are no Rebel Troopers on the map and no Reinforcements left.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels win
globalEvents.eventText:
Clutching your datapad full of Imperial secrets, you run past the barricade. A brutal, fighting retreat occupies the next few hours, but eventually you are able to get clear of Imperial forces.

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Heroes receive the Rebel Troopers as allies.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels lose
globalEvents.eventText:
You look on in horror as the Imperial forces overrun the barricade and cut down any who oppose them. In moments, not one of your troopers remains standing. Imperials then begin
to surround you and your datapad is destroyed by blaster crossfire. You decide to make your escape before you encounter the same fate as your comrades.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: Barricade 1 Destroyed
globalEvents.eventText: One of the barricades is reduced to rubble by the Imperial attacks.

globalEvents.name: Storm the Barricade
globalEvents.eventText: After the last barricades comes crushing down, the way into the Rebel encampment is free for the Empire.

eventActions.theText: How many Rebel Troopers are on the map?

globalEvents.name: Finish Them
globalEvents.eventText: The door opens into a cramped command center. Immediately, guards turn to face you, and alarms blare through the facility.

entityProperties.name: Door 1
entityProperties.theText:
A security door leads into the Imperial facility.

{-} The door is locked to Imperial figures.

eventActions.theText: At the far end of the room, the terminal containing the data is mounted to the wall.

entityProperties.name: Terminal 1
entityProperties.theText:
Encrypted data is spooling across the terminal's display.

{-} A hero can interact with the terminal ({I}) to try and download the data.

eventActions.theText:
{-} A hero can interact with the terminal ({I}) to try and download the data.
{-} The mission will progress when the data is downloaded.

{-} Rebel mission tokens represent barricades. Barricades are impassable terrain and can be attacked (Health: 8; Defense: 1 {G}). Rebel figures can move through a barricade as normal terrain.
{-} While defending, a Rebel Trooper can choose a barricade through which line of sight was traced to add 1 black die to his defense pool. Then, that barricade suffers {H} equal to the {G} results on that black die.
{-} Heroes have limited Reinforcements. At the end of each Round, for each defeated Rebel Trooper, 1 Reinforcement is spent to deploy another Rebel Trooper.
{-} When a hero withdraws, he is incapacitated instead, When activating, he receives only 1 action and can only use that action to perform a move.
{-} A hero can interact with the terminal ({I}) to try and download the data.
{-} The mission will progress when the data is downloaded.
{-} The Rebels lose at the end of Round 6, or when there are no Rebel Troopers on the map and no Reinforcements left.

You start to slice into the terminal.

{-} Test{I}. Apply +1 {B} for each strain token on the terminal, then discard all strain tokens on the terminal. Enter the number of successes below.

inputList.theText:
You make some progress, but the security systems keep booting you out.

{-} Place 1 strain token on the terminal for each {B} result gained.

globalEvents.name: Alarm
globalEvents.eventText:
"Data security compromised." This amplified warning repeats through the compound as alarms ring out.

You got the data. Now you only need to get out.

{-} When all heroes are on or adjacent to the Entrance (blue highlight), click the highlight and select "Heroes Depart".
{-} The Rebels win when the heroes depart.

entityProperties.name: Terminal 1
entityProperties.theText:
Encrypted data is spooling across the terminal's display.

{-} A hero can interact with the terminal ({I}) to try and download the data.

entityProperties.name: Entrance Depart
entityProperties.theText:
Your extraction coordinates lead to this point.

{-} When all heroes are on or adjacent to the blue highlight, click "Heroes Depart".
